game.name: Train Simulator: DB BR 152 Loco Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The mixed-traffic BR 152 is one of the most popular locomotives among drivers seen on Germany’s railways today.The high performance ES64F locomotive built by Siemens forms part of the company’s EuroSprinter range, and started life as a mixed traffic locomotive.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The mixed-traffic BR 152 is one of the most popular locomotives among drivers seen on Germany’s railways today.The high performance ES64F locomotive built by Siemens forms part of the company’s EuroSprinter range, and started life as a mixed traffic locomotive.
